settings.title: Shipping & Return
settings.content:
Shipping Policy

We unfortunately do not offer Free Shipping, because we offer the best prices and the best premium gifts with purchase.

Below we show our current shipping prices along with delivery times. These prices and delivery times may be affected during the holidays.

 Expedited Shipping (Delivered with in 1-4 Working Days) $7.99 USD
Express 2 Day Air (1 - 2 Business Days) $12.99 USD
Standard Delivery (Delivered within 4-7 Working Days) $5.99 USD
VIP Expedited (1 - 3 Business Days) $8.99 USD

Returns Policy

To process your return, a link will be provided, that will walk you through the step by step instructions on how to proceed the Return.

We'll process your return within two weeks and issue a store credit, or exchange. If you have any questions, please reach out to our customer service team through your account. Note that we reserve the right to deny any return requests store credit if we suspect the policy or program was abused.

We understand that receiving a damaged package can be disappointing, but please note that if the product inside is still functional, we unfortunately cannot offer a resolution. Transit can be unpredictable and these types of incidents are beyond our control.

Read More about our Return Policy Here

settings.content_popup: 2-3 Day Shipping on Most Orders!
When you purchase from Dermavenue, you know you're getting the real thing! Products from Dermavenue are guaranteed Authentic.
Select Purchases are eligible for Free Gifts!

Dermavenue offers a Rewards Loyalty program once a customer opts in to join. To learn more and how to take advantage of all the points associated with it, a link to read more will be provided.

01) Sign Up, create an account and get 100 points!

02) Earn Points every time you shop.

03) Redeem Points for exclusive Points

You may return most new, unopened items within 30 days of delivery for a full refund. We'll also pay the return shipping costs if the return is a result of our error (you received an incorrect or defective item, etc.).

You should expect to receive your refund within four weeks of giving your package to the return shipper, however, in many cases you will receive a refund more quickly. This time period includes the transit time for us to receive your return from the shipper (5 to 10 business days), the time it takes us to process your return once we receive it (3 to 5 business days), and the time it takes your bank to process our refund request (5 to 10 business days).

If you need to return an item, simply login to your account, view the order using the "Complete Orders" link under the My Account menu and click the Return Item(s) button. We'll notify you via e-mail of your refund once we've received and processed the returned item.

settings.block_description: Uniquely formulated and clinically-proven to address eyelid hooding and droopiness in addition to the total eye area​.
Designed with the skin’s Dermal-Epidermal Junction (DEJ) in mind, a critical factor in skin aging​, and features DEJ-targeting ingredients.
Clinically-proven to reduce the visible signs of aging around the total eye area including eyelid drooping, under-eye crepiness, fine lines in the crow’s feet area and elasticity.

settings.caption_text: 62 year-old subject, Fitzpatrick skin type III Light Source: Standard Light *12 week clinical study. Results may vary.

settings.block_description: Helps to support the skin’s natural production of Vitamins C and E. Delivers the next generation of Vitamin C - correcting existing damage and defending your skin for the future
Supports the skin’s Microbiome with prebiotic technology. Who benefits? All skin types. Ideal for those with dry, oily or combination skin types.

settings.caption_text: *VISIA®-CR images taken with cross-polarized filter at Baseline and after 12 weeks of directed use, two times daily.Results may vary.

HA⁵® Rejuvenating Hydrator supports the skin’s ability to replenish its own hyaluronic acid (HA) for overall skin health. HA⁵® Rejuvenating Hydrator has a proprietary mix of five HA forms that smooth the skin, thereby decreasing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. The 5 HA's work synergistically to provide immediate smoothing and continuous hydration throughout the day.
Naturally derived alpha-hydroxy acid (AHA) combined with beta-hydroxy acid (BHA) in addition to jojoba spheres help exfoliate skin and enhance skin texture.

settings.custom_liquid:
{% if product.handle == 'dermavenue-c-e-essential-serum-with-ferulic-acid' %}
<tolstoy-carousel
      data-tags="{% for tag in product.tags -%}{{ tag }},{%- endfor %}"
      class="tolstoy-carousel"
      data-publish-id="day6sg3m70gqq" 
      data-product-id="{{ product.id }}">
    </tolstoy-carousel>
{% elsif product.handle == 'skinmedica-tns-advaned-serum' %}

    <tolstoy-carousel
      data-tags="{% for tag in product.tags -%}{{ tag }},{%- endfor %}"
      class="tolstoy-carousel"
      data-publish-id="wpj960gi4snpt" 
      data-product-id="{{ product.id }}">
    </tolstoy-carousel>
  
{% elsif product.handle == 'skinmedica-tns-advanced-serum-bundle' %}

    <tolstoy-carousel
      data-tags="{% for tag in product.tags -%}{{ tag }},{%- endfor %}"
      class="tolstoy-carousel"
      data-publish-id="wpj960gi4snpt" 
      data-product-id="{{ product.id }}">
    </tolstoy-carousel>

{% elsif product.handle == 'dermavenue-hydra-l-hydrating-smoothing-lotion' %} 
<tolstoy-carousel
      data-tags="{% for tag in product.tags -%}{{ tag }},{%- endfor %}"
      class="tolstoy-carousel"
      data-publish-id="jw1uq1i9o0390" 
      data-product-id="{{ product.id }}">
    </tolstoy-carousel>
{% endif %}
